info.name: Your eyes never die!
info.description: This theme removes the background for the overwatch forums background, as the lined background can really hurt some people's eyes. This also removes the background for all other game forums on the battle.net site.
info.additionalInfo: I may expand this later, possibly to include other, optional changes to help make reading the forums easier. You can contact me at kyorasalt@gmail.com for suggestions!
